name: Chicken and Vegetable Pasta Salad
author: BETHANYGRONBERG
summary: Chicken, vegetables and pasta make up this filling salad which everyone seems to like, even people who don't like pasta salad. This is great for hot summer days when you just don't feel like turning on the oven. Note: the amounts here are estimates, as I rarely measure when I make this salad, so feel free to add a bit more or less of whatever you please.
ingredients: 3  green onions, chopped into 1 inch pieces
directions: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente, rinse under cold water and drain
In a large bowl, combine the pasta, chicken, green onions, bell pepper, olives and cucumber
Pour dressing over salad and toss to coat
Chill for 2 hours before serving; sprinkle with sunflower seeds if desired
